oai_dc:dc.dc:title: repetitiveness checker
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1) Finds repeated sequences of words in documents (repetitiveness checker) 2) Finds common sequences of words in several documents (version comparison) A sequence of words consists of minimally two words. There is no upper limit of the number of words in a sequence, but sequences do not transgress sentence delimiters. There are several weight functions to choose from, each defining "good" sequences in a different way, based on word frequency, sequence lenght and number of repetitions.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Center for Sprogteknologi, University of Copenhagen
